name: Zombie Hit and Run VR
description:
Zombie Hit and Run VR is a fun short VR experience where the player controls a simple VR car with the aim to ragdoll as many zombies as possible! A small target of 20 is made but with an unlimited amount spawning  players can try hit high scores. With the emphasis on the arcade like driving the aim of the experience is to give a more fun physics vibe than full on realistic driving experience. 

Disclaimer: No assets were made by me. All assets were found within the Unity Asset Store or found online. This is a non profit project.
